sentence.Network_cn: 大约花3.5万英镑就能买到一所宜居的房子。

sentence.Network_en: The house should be habitable by the new year.
sentence.Network_cn: 房子到新年时应该就可以住进去了。

sentence.Network_en: This house is no longer habitable.
sentence.Network_cn: 这所房子已经不能住人了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...exoplanets外星球，exo-前缀，这指在……之外的。habitable可居住的，宜居的support life能支撑生命，适合生命存在的.
h打头e结尾的单词_百度知道 ... hue-- 色彩 habitable-- 适于居住的 haggle-- 讨价还价.
originally：adv. 最初，原先 ... 2. harsh a. 严峻的；严厉的 3.habitable  a. 适宜居住的 4.regional  a. 地区的，区域的.
their damp drafty house was scarcely habitable ., 他们潮湿透风的屋子不宜住人.

list.abs: 人教版八年级上册英语单词表（含音标） ... 30 how many 多少 32 habit n. 习惯 34 of course 当然.
习_百度百科 ... ⑴ 经常，常常[ often] ⑴习性；习惯[ habit;custom;usual practice] 习而不察[ to call it in question].
和Luke一起看新闻扩大词汇量_英语杂谈_天涯论坛 ... habitude，n， 习俗，习惯 habitation，n， 居住，住所 cohabitation，n， 同居.
和Luke一起看新闻扩大词汇量_英语杂谈_天涯论坛 ... habitude，n， 习俗，习惯 habitation，n， 居住，住所 cohabitation，n， 同居.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... habituate v 使习惯于 habitant n 居住者 habitat n （动植物）居住地.
Mr. Hu ' s abstemious habits didn ' t hold him back ., 胡士泰有节制的生活习惯并没有阻碍提升.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin habitabilis, from habitare 'possess, inhabit'

entry.def: If a place is habitable, it is good enough for people to live in.

example.ex: Making the house habitable was a major undertaking.
example.tran: 把这所房子收拾得可以住人，那可是项大工程。

auth_sentence.content: Habitable islands appeal to a certain type of buyer.
auth_sentence.res_content: Habitable islands appeal to a certain type of buyer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Habitable islands appeal to a certain type of buyer.

auth_sentence.content: There is still a more or less habitable planet there.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is still a more or less habitable planet there.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is still a more or less habitable planet there.

auth_sentence.content: Some nearby towns may never again be habitable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some nearby towns may never again be habitable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some nearby towns may never again be habitable.

Sentence.sentence: Likewise, theimpactof this warming will be very different depending on where you are—coastal areas must worry about rising sea levels, while Siberia and northern Canada may become more habitable (宜居的) andappealingfor humans than these areas are now.

sentences.en: This house is no longer habitable.
sentences.cn: 这所房子已经不能住人了。
